attributes.action: Ban the sales of dangerous knives to all age groups
attributes.additional_details: There are stabbings in our beloved UK on a weekly basis now. It just has to stop, as our children and adults do not feel safe anymore!
attributes.background: Sir Kier wants to tighten up on under age children buying knives. I would like this to be adapted to all age groups banned from purchasing or selling knives, unless to industry

rejection.details:
You may wish to sign the following petition, which calls for similar action:

Ban on knife possession except for licensed/trade purposes & increase sentences
https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/706494
